column1: Smoque BBQ////This place is phenomenal.  If you're into smoked and barbecued food
column2: this place is the gold standard since everything on the menu is delicious!  They have red meat
column3: chicken and sausage.  I can't tell which I like more
column4: the taste of the meats or the sauces (I've been caught drinking the sauce!).  The sides are all amazing
column5: each has it's own unique taste
column6: which is compared to no other establishment.  My go-to dish is the sliced brisket sandwich
column7: a side of barbecue beans and a half's of St. Louis ribs.
